Info.Title: Blood Diamond
Info.Writer: Charles Leavitt (screenplay), Charles Leavitt (story), C. Gaby Mitchell (story)
Info.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou, Jennifer Connelly, Kagiso Kuypers
Info.Plot: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 27 nominations.
